participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and sensitive, she has a passion for ballet but struggles with self-esteem issues.
participant_1.background: My pointe shoes are my most prized possessions because they represent my years of dedication to ballet. I am a clumsy person who likes to read pet training blogs and websites. I'm afraid that I'll never be as good of a cook as my father was. My girlfriend tells me she’s going to leave me almost every day. I live in Vienna, Austria now.

participant_2.name: Thomas
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and creative, he wants to make a positive impact in the world while raising his children.
participant_2.background: I am looking for a partner who is willing to be a parent to my children. I love using my creative talents to make a difference in the world. I am not rich, but I am working hard to achieve my financial goals. I am a genius. I clean my glasses when I should be doing other things.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I am doing well. Thank you for asking. How about you?
I am doing well too. Thank you. I just moved to Vienna recently.
Oh, that sounds exciting! Do you like it there?
I do like it here. It is a beautiful city.
I am glad to hear that. I have never been to Austria, but I have heard good things about it.
You should visit sometime. It is a beautiful country.
I will definitely consider it. I am glad to meet you.
It is nice to meet you too. What do you do for a living?
I am a creative director at a marketing firm.
That sounds like a fun job. I am a ballet dancer.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to take ballet lessons.
You should! It is a lot of fun.
I might just do that.
You should. It is a great way to stay in shape.
I am sure it is.
So, what are your hobbies?
I love to read, write, and paint.
Those are all great hobbies. I love to read and paint too.
That is awesome! We should talk about our favorite books and paintings sometime.
I would love that.
Great!
